title: CGMiner 3.7.2 - GPU Mining Software (Litecoin Scrypt)
description:
CGMiner Version 3.7.2 (For Windows)

This version of CGMiner supports GPU mining; higher versions no longer support GPU mining but only ASICs are supported.

Usage,

1. Create a .bat file
2. Enter mining details, such as: cgminer --scrypt -o http://pool:port -u username -p password

The scrypt parameter will ensure you are mining scrypt coins, such as Litecoin.


Source: https://github.com/ckolivas/cgminer
